actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.

actions.subcommittee: Specialty Crops and Foreign Agriculture Programs
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Specialty Crops and Foreign Agriculture Programs.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Specialty Crops and Foreign Agriculture Programs

official_title: To amend the crop disaster assistance program for 2003 to clarify the manner in which the Secretary of Agriculture is required to make assistance available to producers under the program.

summary.text: Amends the Military Construction Appropriations and Emergency Hurricane Supplemental Appropriations Act, 2005 to provide that carry over pounds for the 2002 crop of a commodity shall not be used in determining crop disaster program payments for the 2003 crop of the same commodity.

titles.title: To amend the crop disaster assistance program for 2003 to clarify the manner in which the Secretary of Agriculture is required to make assistance available to producers under the program.
